top_comments.comment:
Napanood ko nung kinanta niya to sa Live stream niya, grabe yung kaba ko sobra kasi itong All By Myself ay isa sa mga kantang may mataas na expectations na dahil napaka legendary at iconic nung song. Gulat ako nung na hit ni Gigi yung high notes. Napaka galing!

Pero eto gumawa siya ng formal cover ng song na 'to. Grabe! Ang husay. Hindi lang si Gigi, but also the band as well. Ang lulupet! ❤️
I would dare say she's almost in her prime. To think she's this good and yet may igagaling pa. Let's make her big!!

comments_since_last_sample.body: AWESOME...SUPER DUPER TALAGA ANG GG VIBES
Epic. 👏That raspy voice is indeed her asset. 🥰🥰🥰 Sounds so good. ♥️😍

Life must be good para  sa banda.
Tumataba na at mga lumalake na mga tiyan.
charice is still the best for this song. but gigi is good too. love her raspy voice
I love your eyeliner 😍. Dyd po na my hair is inspired by you, may curtain bangs din 🥰
Yung high note na high note ka tapos ngumiti ka lang after hitting those notes!!!!!!! Grabe ka na talaga 2021 😭😭😭
